about_the_game:
Help Special Forces operative Della retrieve the Bio-waste containers that are causing the zombie outbreak and evacuate in the helicopter.

Explore the island and find Bio-waste containers and neutralise enough Zombies to achieve the Zombie Death Quota.
Scavenge for guns, ammo, grenades and health packs scattered around the island to help you in your mission.

This first person shooter was first launched on the Xbox 360 Indie Games service in 2012, the XBLIG service was closed down in 2017. Play this part of gaming history which is preserved here today and support me by checking out my newest game Splodge Royale.

Weapons

  • Flamethrower: A Heavy Metal flamethrower.
  • Shotgun: Never be without one in an apocalypse.
  • Scoped Rifle: When you don’t want to move much.
  • Pistol: Infinite ammo.
  • Machine Gun: Short range, but very good when you are surrounded.

Levels

  • Play 13 increasingly difficult levels.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent Zombie head explosions with lots of blood. Burning Zombies. Slightly scary sounds and music.

name: Zombie Death Quota

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and later 64-bit or 32-bit
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 140 MB available space

short_description: Help Special Forces operative Della retrieve the Bio-waste containers that are causing the zombie outbreak. Grenade, shotgun, snipe and flame your way through the zombie horde and then evacuate in the helicopter.
